launcher.startScript: (cd ~/jenkins-utils && git pull git@github.com:sifive/jenkins-utils.git) && \ AGENT_NAME=syssw.fusdk.public.0013 \ JNLP_SECRET=3f673ec0ead861c86731d56b1885706eeb7b27165b792fdd96941aada58842d4 \ JENKINS_URL=https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/ \ JENKINS_AGENT_CPUS_PER_TASK=24 \ JENKINS_AGENT_MEM=64G \ JENKINS_AGENT_SALLOC_ACCOUNT=sw_ci \ JENKINS_AGENT_SLURM_PARTITION=sw-sdk-cloud \ ~/jenkins-utils/tools/jenkins-agent-salloc.sh
